title: BlueMove NFT Marketplace
description: Explore BlueMove, a popular NFT marketplace on Aptos that allows users to mint, buy, sell, and trade digital collectibles with multi-chain support and advanced features.

tasks.title: Prepare for NFT Trading
tasks.description: Add at least 0.1 APT to your wallet to explore BlueMove's marketplace features

tasks.title: BlueMove Basics
tasks.description: Understand what BlueMove offers in the Aptos ecosystem
tasks.question: What is BlueMove primarily used for?
options: NFT marketplace for buying, selling, and trading digital collectibles
tasks.correctAnswer: NFT marketplace for buying, selling, and trading digital collectibles

tasks.title: Multi-Chain Support
tasks.question: Besides Aptos, which other blockchain ecosystem does BlueMove support?

tasks.title: NFT Minting
tasks.question: What NFT creation options does BlueMove provide?
options: Both single NFTs and collections with customizable traits and royalties
tasks.correctAnswer: Both single NFTs and collections with customizable traits and royalties

tasks.title: Marketplace Fees
tasks.description: Learn about the fee structure on BlueMove
tasks.question: How are marketplace fees typically structured on BlueMove?
options: Percentage-based marketplace fee plus optional creator royalties
tasks.correctAnswer: Percentage-based marketplace fee plus optional creator royalties

tasks.title: Listing Types
tasks.question: What NFT listing methods does BlueMove support?
options: Both fixed price listings and auctions
tasks.correctAnswer: Both fixed price listings and auctions

tasks.title: NFT Standards
tasks.description: Learn about technical standards on BlueMove
tasks.question: What NFT standard does BlueMove use on Aptos?

tasks.title: Collection Verification
tasks.question: How does BlueMove handle NFT collection verification?
options: Official collections can receive verified status after review
Only collections from specific creators are allowed
tasks.correctAnswer: Official collections can receive verified status after review

tasks.title: Launchpad Features
tasks.description: Learn about NFT primary sales on BlueMove
tasks.question: What is BlueMove's Launchpad used for?
options: NFT collection primary sales and minting events
tasks.correctAnswer: NFT collection primary sales and minting events

tasks.title: Wallet Compatibility
tasks.question: Which wallets can typically be used with BlueMove on Aptos?
options: Multiple Aptos wallets including Petra, Martian, and others
tasks.correctAnswer: Multiple Aptos wallets including Petra, Martian, and others

tasks.title: Community Features
tasks.description: Learn about social aspects of BlueMove
tasks.question: What social features does BlueMove offer?
options: User profiles, following creators, and collection watchlists
tasks.correctAnswer: User profiles, following creators, and collection watchlists
